=Templates=

Templates in VosaoCMS are used to arrange web design with page content.

For templates rendering Vosao uses Velocity engine.

Basic simple template looks like:
{{{
<html>
<head>
  <title>$page.title</title>
</head>  
<body>

$page.content

</body>

</html>
}}}

=== Template variables ===

*Current page*

 * _String_ page.title  
 * _String_ page.friendlyURL
 * _String_ page.content
 * _String_ page.comments - will render comments if comments allowed for this page

*Site global configuration*

 * _String_ config.googleAnalyticsId
 * _String_ config.siteEmail
 * _String_ config.siteDomain

*Helper service*

 * _Page_ service.findPage(url) - find page by friendly url
 * _List of Page_ service.findPageChildren(url) - find all child pages of specified page by url ordered by publish date.
 * _String_ service.findContent(url) - find page content by friendly url
 * _List of String_ service.findChildrenContent(url) - find all child pages content of specified page url ordered by publish date.
   _usage example_
   {{{
     #foreach($p in $service.findPageChildren("/blogs")
       <h1 class="blog-title">$p.title</h1>
       <div class="blog-entry">$service.findContent($p.friendlyURL)</div>
     #end
   }}}
